<p>Informatica has created a set of campaigns for your use. Our campaigns-in-a-box enable you to reach your target customers effectively and efficiently. These campaigns are customizable, allowing you to add your company logo, copy/text, and “calls to action.” Use these campaigns to quickly and effectively market to your prospects and existing customers.
</p></contents></template><panelset type="custom" scroll=""><panels><panel width="30%"><components><template multiple="false" model="" allowhtml="true"><contents><img src="http://i62.tinypic.com/23thw1j.jpg" width=100%" style="border: 1px solid #e3e3e3"></contents></template></components></panel><panel width="70%"><components><template multiple="false" model="" allowhtml="true"><contents><div class="widget"><div class="pad-10 pad-left-20" ><p>This 3-touch campaign provides your prospects and customers with an overview of master data management (MDM), including challenges and best practices, plus tips and tools for an efficient and effective MDM solution. @font-face {
    font-family: FuturaPTB;
    src: url(/resource/PARC_fonts/FuturaStd-Book.otf);
}

@font-face {
    font-family: ArialPARC;
    src: url(/resource/PARC_fonts/Arial.ttf);
}

/* General Styling */

.nx-page .ui-widget, body .nx-page, .nx-page td {
  font-family: ArialPARC, sans-serif;
}

/* Page Titles */

.nx-pagetitle-maintitle .ui-widget {
    font-family: FuturaPTB, sans-serif;
    font-weight: normal;
    font-size: 16pt;
    color: #6d6f71;
}

/* Buttons */

.nx-actionbutton {
    float: left;
    background: #254EA2;
    margin: 0 6px 5px 0;
    border-radius:3px;
    -webkit-border-radius: 3px;
    -moz-border-radius: 3px;
}

.ui-button, .ui-widget-content .ui-button.ui-state-default{
    background: #254EA2;
    margin: 0 6px 5px 0;
    border-radius:3px;
    color: white;
    font-size: 12pt !important;
    height: 50px;
    padding: 0px 10px;
}
.ui-button .ui-button-text{
    line-height: 41px;
}
.ui-button-text-icon-primary .ui-button-text{
    padding-left: 23px;
}

.ui-button-text-icon-primary .ui-icon{
    margin-top: -8px;
}

.ui-button.ui-state-hover, .ui-widget-content .ui-button.ui-state-default:hover{
    color: black;
    background: #FFD400;
}

.ui-button.nx-button-secondary{
    color: #254EA2;
    box-shadow: 0 0 0 1px #254EA2 inset;
    border-color: #254EA2;
}

.ui-button.nx-button-secondary.ui-state-hover{
    box-shadow: 0 0 0 1px #254EA2 inset;
    border-color: #254EA2;
    color: #254EA2;
    background: #eee;
}

.nx-actionselect {
    background: #254EA2;
    cursor: pointer;
    white-space: nowrap;
    position: relative;
    color: #FFF;
    border-radius: 3px;
    font-weight: 400;
    font-size: 12pt;
    font-family: ArialPARC, sans-serif;
    margin: 0 4px 7px 0;
    border:none;
    box-shadow:none;
    line-height: 41px;
    height: 50px;
    padding: 0px 10px;
    border-bottom: none;
}

.nx-actionselect.nx-conditiontoken:hover{
    background: #FFD400;
    color: black;
}

.nx-actionselect:hover, .nx-actionbutton:hover {
    color: #000;
    background: #FFD400;
}

.nx-actionselect.unavailable:hover, .nx-actionbutton.unavailable:hover {
    color: white;
    background: #ddd;
    cursor: default;
}

/* Dropdown */
.nx-actionselect-dropdown{
  background: none;
  border-radius: 3px;
}
.nx-actionselect-dropdown>.nx-actionselect-dropdown-item {
  background: #254EA2;
  border-bottom: 1px solid #446AB8;
  color: white;
}

.nx-actionselect-dropdown>.nx-actionselect-dropdown-item:hover {
  background: #FFD400;
  color: black;
  opacity: 1;
}

.nx-actionselect-dropdown>.nx-actionselect-dropdown-item:first-child {
  border-top-right-radius: 3px;
  border-top-left-radius: 3px;
}

.nx-actionselect-dropdown>.nx-actionselect-dropdown-item:last-child {
  border-bottom-right-radius: 3px;
  border-bottom-left-radius: 3px;
  border-bottom: none;
}


/* Tables */

table.nx-skootable-data {
    border-collapse:separate;
}

table.nx-skootable-data th {
    background: #939598;
    height:45px;
    font-family: FuturaPTB, sans-serif;
    font-weight: lighter;
    font-size: 13pt;
    color: #FFFFFF;
    border-right: 1px solid white;
    text-align:left;
    padding-left:10px;
    padding-right:10px;
}

table.nx-skootable-data tbody td, table.nx-skootable-data thead td {
    border-bottom: 1px solid white;
    height: 45px;
    border-right: 1px solid white;
    background: #F0F0F0;
    vertical-align: middle;
    font-family: ArialPARC, sans-serif;
    font-size: 13pt;
}

table.nx-skootable-data a {
    font-size: 13pt;
    color:#254EA2;
}

table.nx-skootable-data tbody tr td:nth-child(odd) {
    background-color:#F9F9F9
}

table.nx-skootable-data tbody tr:nth-child(odd) td:nth-child(even) {
  background-color: #F0F0F0;
}

table.nx-skootable-data .nx-skootable-order-icon{
    margin-top: 3px;
    background: url(data:image/png;base64,);
    width: 13px;
}
table .nx-skootable-order-number{
    display: none !important;
}

.nx-list-footer select {
    width:auto;
    font-family: ArialPARC, sans-serif;
}

.nx-list-footer {
    background:transparent;
}

.nx-list-footer .ui-button.ui-state-hover {
    background:#254EA2;
    color:white;
}
/* Table Search */

.nx-editor-header input.searchbox {
  width: 180px;
  font-size: 12pt;
  border: 1px solid #aaa;
  margin: 0 0 7px;
  font-family: ArialPARC, sans-serif;
  line-height: 41px;
  height: 50px;
  background: #f5f5f5;
}

.nx-editor-header input.searchbox:disabled {
    background: #ddd;
    opacity: .6;
}

.nx-editor-header input.searchbox::-webkit-input-placeholder {
   font-size: 12pt;
}

.nx-editor-header input.searchbox:-moz-placeholder { /* Firefox 18- */
   font-size: 12pt; 
}

.nx-editor-header input.searchbox::-moz-placeholder {  /* Firefox 19+ */
   font-size: 12pt;
}

.nx-editor-header input.searchbox:-ms-input-placeholder {  
   font-size: 12pt;
}

/* Field Editors */

.nx-basicfieldeditor-section-header {
  padding: 8px;
  border-bottom: none;
  font-family: FuturaPTB, sans-serif;
  font-size: 16pt;
  font-weight: 400;
  color: #939598;
}

/* Tabs */
.ui-tabs{
    background: none;
}
.ui-tabs-nav{
    font-family: FuturaPTB, sans-serif;
    
}
.nx-lefttabs>.ui-tabs-nav, .nx-righttabs>.ui-tabs-nav{
    box-shadow: 0px 0px 3px 0px #aaa;
}
.nx-lefttabs>.ui-tabs-nav li a  .nx-template{
    margin: 0px;
    font-size: 10pt;
    line-height: normal;
}
.ui-tabs .ui-tabs-nav .ui-tabs-anchor{
    width: 100%;
    padding: 7px 12px;
    white-space: normal;
}
.ui-tabs .ui-tabs-nav li.ui-tabs-active, .ui-tabs .ui-tabs-nav li.ui-tabs-active.ui-state-hover{
    background: #f1f1f1;
    margin-bottom: 0px;
    padding-bottom: 0px;
}
.ui-tabs .ui-tabs-nav li.ui-tabs-active a, .ui-tabs .ui-tabs-nav li.ui-tabs-active.ui-state-hover a{
    color: black;
}
.ui-tabs .ui-tabs-nav li{
    background: white;
    border-right:none;
}
.ui-tabs .ui-tabs-nav li.ui-state-hover{
    background: #eee;
}
/* Forms */
.nx-basicfieldeditor-item-label.nx-layout-above{
    font-size: 13pt;
    color: #939598;
    line-height: 22pt;
    font-weight: 400;
}
.nx-basicfieldeditor-columngroup {
    background: none;
}
.nx-basicfieldeditor{
    background: none;
    padding: 10px;
}
.nx-basicfieldeditor-section{
    background: none;
    margin: 10px;
}
.nx-basicfieldeditor-item{
    border-bottom: none;
}
.nx-basicfieldeditor .nx-field input:not([type]){
    height: 25px;
    font-family: ArialPARC, sans-serif;
}
.nx-editor .nx-basicfieldeditor-item select{
    max-width: none;
    height: 26px;
    font-family: ArialPARC, sans-serif;
}
.nx-field input, .nx-field textarea, .nx-field select{
    background: white;
    border-color: #ddd;
    border-radius: 3px;
}

/* Wizard */
.nx-wizard .nx-editor-header-title{
    font-family: FuturaPTB, sans-serif;
    font-weight: normal;
    font-size: 16pt;
    color: #6d6f71;
}

/* Multiselect */
.ui-multiselect-checkboxes label input{
    display: inline-block;
    position: relative;
    top: 3px;
}

button.ui-multiselect.ui-widget.ui-state-default {
  background: #254EA2;
  color: white;
  border-radius: 3px;
  border: none;
  min-height: 50px;
  font-size: 12pt;
  line-height: 41px;
}

button.ui-multiselect.ui-state-default:hover {
  background: #FFD400;
  color: black;
}

.ui-multiselect-header.ui-widget-header{
    background: #254EA2;
    font-size: 13pt;
    font-family: ArialPARC, sans-serif;
    border: none;
    padding: 8px 3px;
}
.ui-multiselect-header ul li:nth-child(1) {
  margin-left: 9px;
}
.ui-multiselect-header ul li:nth-child(2) {
  margin-left: 10px;
}
.ui-multiselect-menu.ui-widget-content{
    padding: 3px;
}
.ui-multiselect-header .ui-icon-circle-close{
}
.ui-multiselect-header .ui-icon{
    position: relative;
    top: 1px;
}
.ui-multiselect-header .ui-icon-closethick, .ui-multiselect-header .ui-icon-check{
    margin-right: 2px;
}
.ui-multiselect-menu.ui-widget-content {
  box-shadow: 0px 0px 5px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.3);
}
.ui-multiselect-checkboxes{
    overflow-y: auto;
    font-size: 12pt;
    font-family: ArialPARC, sans-serif;
}

/* Callout Box */
.nx-page .callout-box{
    background: #254EA2;
    padding: 30px;
    color: white;
    font-family: ArialPARC, sans-serif;
    font-size: 13pt;
    margin-bottom: 35px;
}
.nx-page .callout-box h2{
    font-weight: 400;
    color: white;
    font-size: 16pt;
}
.nx-page .callout-box .btn{
    background: #FFD400;
    color: black;
}
.nx-page .callout-box ul{
    margin-bottom: 20px;
}
.nx-template{
    font-family: ArialPARC, sans-serif;
    font-size: 13pt;
    margin: 10px;
}

/* General html */
.nx-page h1, .nx-page h2{
    font-weight: 400;
    font-family: FuturaPTB, sans-serif;
    color: #939598;
}

.nx-template .btn{
    background: #254EA2;
    border-radius:3px;
    color: white;
    font-size: 13pt;
    height: 50px;
    line-height: 21px;
    padding: 15px 30px;
    font-weight: normal;
}
.nx-template{
    color: #6d6f71;
    font-size: 13pt;
    line-height: 18pt;
}
.nx-template li{
    font-size: 13pt;
}
.nx-template a{
    font-size: 13pt;
    color: #4E7DBF;
}

.nx-template a:hover{
    text-decoration: underline;
}

/* vidyard override */
.vidyard_tmask{
    position: fixed !important;
}

.vidyard_play_button a:hover {
  background-position: 0px 0px;
}
.vidyard_play_button a {
  position: absolute;
  margin: -42px 0 0 -26px;
  border-radius: 0px;
  background-position: 0px 0px;
  height: 85px;
  width: 72px;
  background-image: url(data:image/png;base64,);
}</cssitem></css></resources></skuidpage>

<skuidpage unsavedchangeswarning="yes" showsidebar="true" showheader="true"><models/><components><template multiple="false" model="" allowhtml="true"><contents><h2>CAMPAIGN PLANNING GUIDE</h2></contents></template><panelset type="custom" scroll=""><panels><panel width="350"><components><template multiple="false" model="" allowhtml="true"><contents><img src="http://i57.tinypic.com/2d6taqc.jpg"></contents></template></components></panel><panel width="550"><components><template multiple="false" model="" allowhtml="true"><contents><p>This planning tool has been produced to guide INFORM Partners on the steps to create and plan a marketing campaign. Make sure you work with your local Informatica channel representative to ensure you get the latest marketing information and resources to plan and execute your marketing campaign.</p>
<a class="btn" href="">DOWNLOAD GUIDE</a>
</contents></template></components></panel></panels></panelset></components><resources><labels/><javascript/><css><cssitem location="staticresource" name="MasterCSS" cachelocation="true" url=""/></css></resources></skuidpage>

Name: Marketing/Resources
skuid__Layout__c:
<skuidpage unsavedchangeswarning="yes" showsidebar="true" showheader="true"><models/><components><panelset type="custom" scroll=""><panels><panel width="600"><components><template multiple="false" model="" allowhtml="true"><contents><h2>GO PUBLIC WITH OUR PARTNERSHIP</h2>
<p>Our collective brands (Informatica and yours) will generate greater awareness and demand for products and services. As the recognized leader in a number of technologies (Gartner Group) promoting our partnership establishes credibility and confidence with your target customers.</p>
<p>Download the Partner Press Release Guide and follow the steps to issuing your release using the partner release template. We will also provide you with helpful best practices for getting the broadest distribution and readership of your release.</br></br>
<a class="btn" href="">DOWNLOAD PARTNER PR GUIDE</a></p>
</br>
<h2>LEVERAGE THE POWER OF SOCIAL MEDIA</h2>
<p>Incorporating our Social Media Smart Guide into your current and planned efforts to increase your presence across relevant social media channels. We also encourage you to follow the Informatica feeds and leverage the content available to you.</p>
</br>
<a class="btn" href="">DOWNLOAD SOCIAL MEDIA GUIDE</a></p>
</br>
<h2>PROMOTE YOURSELF VIA INFORMATICA MARKETPLACE</h2>
<p>Generate demand for your high-value solution by listing your unique offering on the Informatica Marketplace. Extend your global sales and marketing reach with minimal investment. By promoting your solution, you gain the following benefits:</p>
<ul><li>Global Awareness: Expand your reach with 55,000+ visits per month from over 40,000 unique visitors across 125 countries.</li>
<li>Tap into the User Community: Obtain instant exposure to Informatica’s user community of more than 100,000 members.</li>
<li>Opportunity for Additional Sales: If you have created an application, you can use our global e-Commerce capabilities, take advantage of ongoing promotions, and gain access to more prospects.</li></ul></br>
<a class="btn" href="http://now.informatica.com/Marketplace_Seller_VisibilityforSolution_Reg_Pg.html?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRomrfCcI63Em2iQPJWpsrB0B%2FDC18kX3RUsKrydbgfind1SFJk7a8C6XFNISt1b6DYVTbnB" target="_blank">SIGN UP TODAY</a></contents></template></components></panel><panel width="340"><components><template multiple="true" model="" allowhtml="true"><contents><div class="callout-box"><h2>OPT-IN TO COMMUNICATIONS</h2>
<p>Opt-In to receive Partner Communications today. By subscribing to Informatica’s communications, you will increase your knowledge of Informatica’s products and solutions by receiving:
<ul><li>Newsletters</li>
<li>Invitations for Webinars</li>
<li>Analyst reports</li>
<li>Product updates and announcements</li></ul>
<a class="btn" href="http://now.informatica.com/potential-at-work-reg.html" target="_blank">OPT IN</a></p>
</div></contents></template></components></panel></panels></panelset></components><resources><labels/><javascript/><css><cssitem location="staticresource" name="MasterCSS" cachelocation="true" url=""/></css></resources></skuidpage>

Name: Marketing/Resources/Funds
skuid__Layout__c:
<skuidpage unsavedchangeswarning="yes" showsidebar="true" showheader="true"><models/><components><template multiple="false" model="" allowhtml="true"><contents><h2>INFORMATICA PARTNER ENABLEMENT & EXECUTION FUNDS PROGRAM</h2></contents></template><panelset type="custom" scroll=""><panels><panel width="450"><components><template multiple="false" model="" allowhtml="true"><contents><p>The Informatica Partner Enablement & Execution Funds Program is an
attractive and competitive program that supports our INFORM partners’
success in today’s competitive environment. Informatica is redesigning
the program for greater clarity and accessibility and automating it to
provide you with greater management and reporting capabilities.
The program consists of three funds, which are designed to support a
broad range of partner enablement, demand generation, and sales
development activities.</p>
<h3>TWO PERFORMANCE BASED FUNDS</h3>
<ul><li>The <strong>Partner Referral and Influence Fund</strong> compensates partners when
they source (referral) or assist a deal.</li>
<li>The <strong>Partner Co-op Development Fund</strong> supplies partners compensation
when they resell Informatica solutions</li></ul></br>
<h3>ONE POTENTIAL-BASED FUND</h3>
<ul><li>The <strong>Partner Regional Development Fund</strong> is a proposal-based,
discretionary fund. Partners submit proposals for future quarter
activities and funds are awarded for the best proposals.</li></ul></contents></template></components></panel><panel width="450"><components><template multiple="false" model="" allowhtml="true"><contents><div class="widget"><div class="pad-10 pad-left-20" ><p>Enablement (only allowed for Referral & Assist and Co-op Development Funds)</p>
<ul><li>Informatica Certified Packages</li>
<li>Informatica Professional Services Boot Camps</li></ul>
</br>
<p>Execution (allowed for all 3 Funds)</p>
<ul><li>Advertising - Web, Print</li>
<li>Customer-facing Seminars, Webinars, Workshops</li>
<li>Customer Press Releases, Success Stories</li>
<li>Direct Mail, Email, Newsletters</li>
<li>Event Marketing Services</li>
<li>Telemarketing Services</li></ul>
</div></div></contents></template></components></panel></panels></panelset><template multiple="false" model="" allowhtml="true"><contents><strong><i>Informatica will be launching a partner funds application for use by partners late this quarter. Additional details on the features, benefits, and registration will be provided on this page.</i></strong></contents></template></components><resources><labels/><javascript/><css><cssitem location="staticresource" name="MasterCSS" cachelocation="true" url=""/></css></resources></skuidpage>

Name: Marketing/Resources/Joint-Case-Studies
skuid__Layout__c:
<skuidpage unsavedchangeswarning="yes" showsidebar="true" showheader="true"><models/><components><template multiple="false" model="" allowhtml="true"><contents><h2>JOINT CASE STUDIES</h2></contents></template><template multiple="false" model="" allowhtml="true"><contents><p>A customer case study is a great tool to help you move an opportunity toward more serious discussion.  It’s a versatile piece of collateral, appropriate for use on your website, at events, in social media programs, email campaigns, and newsletters. Get started by completing the following online form.</p>
<a class="btn" href="">DOWNLOAD FORM</a>
</contents></template><template multiple="false" model="" allowhtml="true"><contents><h2>PROCESS FOR CREATING A CASE STUDY</h2></contents></template><template multiple="false" model="" allowhtml="true"><contents><ol><li>Partner/Informatica identify reference opportunity and share details with regional Informatica team.</li>
<li>Customer confirms it has corporate communications (or equivalent) consent to participate in a public reference.</li>
<li>Informatica writer arranges interview with partner to obtain background.</li>
<li>Informatica writer schedules customer interview (either by phone or in person).</li>
<li>Informatica writer composes case study and shares it with predefined internal approval list (to include partner).</li>
<li>Informatica writer submits content to customer/partner for approval.</li>
<li>Upon approval, Informatica delivers content to necessary team for publication.</li></ol>
</contents></template></components><resources><labels/><javascript/><css><cssitem location="staticresource" name="MasterCSS" cachelocation="true" url=""/></css></resources></skuidpage>

cachelocation="true" url="">
@font-face {
    font-family: FuturaPTB;
    src: url(/resource/PARC_fonts/FuturaStd-Book.otf);
}

@font-face {
    font-family: ArialPARC;
    src: url(/resource/PARC_fonts/Arial.ttf);
}

/* General Styling */

.nx-page .ui-widget, body .nx-page, .nx-page td {
  font-family: ArialPARC, sans-serif;
}

/* Page Titles */

.nx-pagetitle-maintitle .ui-widget {
    font-family: FuturaPTB, sans-serif;
    font-weight: normal;
    font-size: 16pt;
    color: #6d6f71;
}

/* Buttons */

.nx-actionbutton {
    float: left;
    background: #254EA2;
    margin: 0 6px 5px 0;
    border-radius:3px;
    -webkit-border-radius: 3px;
    -moz-border-radius: 3px;
}

.ui-button, .ui-widget-content .ui-button.ui-state-default{
    background: #254EA2;
    margin: 0 6px 5px 0;
    border-radius:3px;
    color: white;
    font-size: 12pt !important;
    height: 50px;
    padding: 0px 10px;
}
.ui-button .ui-button-text{
    line-height: 41px;
}
.ui-button-text-icon-primary .ui-button-text{
    padding-left: 23px;
}

.ui-button-text-icon-primary .ui-icon{
    margin-top: -8px;
}

.ui-button.ui-state-hover, .ui-widget-content .ui-button.ui-state-default:hover{
    color: black;
    background: #FFD400;
}

.ui-button.nx-button-secondary{
    color: #254EA2;
    box-shadow: 0 0 0 1px #254EA2 inset;
    border-color: #254EA2;
}

.ui-button.nx-button-secondary.ui-state-hover{
    box-shadow: 0 0 0 1px #254EA2 inset;
    border-color: #254EA2;
    color: #254EA2;
    background: #eee;
}

.nx-actionselect {
    background: #254EA2;
    cursor: pointer;
    white-space: nowrap;
    position: relative;
    color: #FFF;
    border-radius: 3px;
    font-weight: 400;
    font-size: 12pt;
    font-family: ArialPARC, sans-serif;
    margin: 0 4px 7px 0;
    border:none;
    box-shadow:none;
    line-height: 41px;
    height: 50px;
    padding: 0px 10px;
    border-bottom: none;
}

.nx-actionselect.nx-conditiontoken:hover{
    background: #FFD400;
    color: black;
}

.nx-actionselect:hover, .nx-actionbutton:hover {
    color: #000;
    background: #FFD400;
}

.nx-actionselect.unavailable:hover, .nx-actionbutton.unavailable:hover {
    color: white;
    background: #ddd;
    cursor: default;
}

/* Dropdown */
.nx-actionselect-dropdown{
  background: none;
  border-radius: 3px;
}
.nx-actionselect-dropdown>.nx-actionselect-dropdown-item {
  background: #254EA2;
  border-bottom: 1px solid #446AB8;
  color: white;
}

.nx-actionselect-dropdown>.nx-actionselect-dropdown-item:hover {
  background: #FFD400;
  color: black;
  opacity: 1;
}

.nx-actionselect-dropdown>.nx-actionselect-dropdown-item:first-child {
  border-top-right-radius: 3px;
  border-top-left-radius: 3px;
}

.nx-actionselect-dropdown>.nx-actionselect-dropdown-item:last-child {
  border-bottom-right-radius: 3px;
  border-bottom-left-radius: 3px;
  border-bottom: none;
}


/* Tables */

table.nx-skootable-data {
    border-collapse:separate;
}

table.nx-skootable-data th {
    background: #939598;
    height:45px;
    font-family: FuturaPTB, sans-serif;
    font-weight: lighter;
    font-size: 13pt;
    color: #FFFFFF;
    border-right: 1px solid white;
    text-align:left;
    padding-left:10px;
    padding-right:10px;
}

table.nx-skootable-data tbody td, table.nx-skootable-data thead td {
    border-bottom: 1px solid white;
    height: 45px;
    border-right: 1px solid white;
    background: #F0F0F0;
    vertical-align: middle;
    font-family: ArialPARC, sans-serif;
    font-size: 13pt;
}

table.nx-skootable-data a {
    font-size: 13pt;
    color:#254EA2;
}

table.nx-skootable-data tbody tr td:nth-child(odd) {
    background-color:#F9F9F9
}

table.nx-skootable-data tbody tr:nth-child(odd) td:nth-child(even) {
  background-color: #F0F0F0;
}

table.nx-skootable-data .nx-skootable-order-icon{
    margin-top: 3px;
    background: url(data:image/png;base64,);
    width: 13px;
}

.nx-list-footer select {
    width:auto;

    row = model.getFirstRow();
var pId= model.getFieldValue( row, "Product_Request__c.Id" ); 
var picount=model.getFieldValue( row, "Product_Request__c.Total_Product_Items__c"); 
var status=model.getFieldValue( row, "Product_Request__c.Status__c"); 
var updkey=model.getFieldValue( row, "Product_Request__c.Is_this_a_request_for_an_updated_key__c"); 
var serlickey=model.getFieldValue( row, "Product_Request__c.Serial_License_Key__c"); 

if(picount<1 && updkey==='No'){ 
    alert("Please add a Product Item before submitting for approval."); 
} 
else if(updkey==='Yes' && (serlickey.length===0 || isNaN(serlickey)===true)){ 
    alert("Please enter Serial # License Key in number format for updated key request."); 
} 
else if(status==='Approved' || status==='Pending Review' || status==='Fulfilled'){ 
    alert("Your request is either already approved, fulfilled or under pending review."); 
} 
else{ 
    var answer = confirm('Please note: Your request is pending approval by Informatica. You should expect a response from us within 3 business days. '); 
    if (answer) { 
        parent.location.href = "p/process/Submit?id="+pId; 
    }
}</jsitem></javascript></resources></skuidpage>

<strong>Informatica Opportunities are Everywhere – Register Them Today</strong></br>
<p>Our opportunity management system enables you to register and manage new business opportunities to close. The simple yet comprehensive system will provide your salesforce with the ability to track and move the opportunity through the sales cycle to close.</p>
<p>Informatica employs a proven methodology and process engineered for a successful close.  Here is a visual of the sales lifecycle with information and actions for every stage.</p>
<img src="">
<p>This opportunity lifecycle provides customer and partner actions and outcomes concluding with the completion of documentation to be submitted to the Sales Operations Group.</p>

<p>The purpose of using Opportunity Registration is to collaborate and secure your legitimacy to work on opportunities by recording your involvement. It allows you to formally register your involvement by automatically informing the Informatica team. The Informatica team will review the opportunity and then initiate the approval process. This ensures real time collaboration between you and the Informatica team. 
</p>

    }</jsitem></javascript><css><cssitem location="staticresource" name="MasterCSS" cachelocation="true" url="">
@font-face {
    font-family: FuturaPTB;
    src: url(/resource/PARC_fonts/FuturaStd-Book.otf);
}

@font-face {
    font-family: ArialPARC;
    src: url(/resource/PARC_fonts/Arial.ttf);
}

/* General Styling */

.nx-page .ui-widget, body .nx-page, .nx-page td {
  font-family: ArialPARC, sans-serif;
}

/* Page Titles */

.nx-pagetitle-maintitle .ui-widget {
    font-family: FuturaPTB, sans-serif;
    font-weight: normal;
    font-size: 16pt;
    color: #6d6f71;
}

/* Buttons */

.nx-actionbutton {
    float: left;
    background: #254EA2;
    margin: 0 6px 5px 0;
    border-radius:3px;
    -webkit-border-radius: 3px;
    -moz-border-radius: 3px;
}

.ui-button, .ui-widget-content .ui-button.ui-state-default{
    background: #254EA2;
    margin: 0 6px 5px 0;
    border-radius:3px;
    color: white;
    font-size: 12pt !important;
    height: 50px;
    padding: 0px 10px;
}
.ui-button .ui-button-text{
    line-height: 41px;
}
.ui-button-text-icon-primary .ui-button-text{
    padding-left: 23px;
}

.ui-button-text-icon-primary .ui-icon{
    margin-top: -8px;
}

.ui-button.ui-state-hover, .ui-widget-content .ui-button.ui-state-default:hover{
    color: black;
    background: #FFD400;
}

.ui-button.nx-button-secondary{
    color: #254EA2;
    box-shadow: 0 0 0 1px #254EA2 inset;
    border-color: #254EA2;
}

.ui-button.nx-button-secondary.ui-state-hover{
    box-shadow: 0 0 0 1px #254EA2 inset;
    border-color: #254EA2;
    color: #254EA2;
    background: #eee;
}

.nx-actionselect {
    background: #254EA2;
    cursor: pointer;
    white-space: nowrap;
    position: relative;
    color: #FFF;
    border-radius: 3px;
    font-weight: 400;
    font-size: 12pt;
    font-family: ArialPARC, sans-serif;
    margin: 0 4px 7px 0;
    border:none;
    box-shadow:none;
    line-height: 41px;
    height: 50px;
    padding: 0px 10px;
    border-bottom: none;
}

.nx-actionselect.nx-conditiontoken:hover{
    background: #FFD400;
    color: black;
}

.nx-actionselect:hover, .nx-actionbutton:hover {
    color: #000;
    background: #FFD400;
}

.nx-actionselect.unavailable:hover, .nx-actionbutton.unavailable:hover {
    color: white;
    background: #ddd;
    cursor: default;
}

/* Dropdown */
.nx-actionselect-dropdown{
  background: none;
  border-radius: 3px;
}
.nx-actionselect-dropdown>.nx-actionselect-dropdown-item {
  background: #254EA2;
  border-bottom: 1px solid #446AB8;
  color: white;
}

.nx-actionselect-dropdown>.nx-actionselect-dropdown-item:hover {
  background: #FFD400;
  color: black;
  opacity: 1;
}

.nx-actionselect-dropdown>.nx-actionselect-dropdown-item:first-child {
  border-top-right-radius: 3px;
  border-top-left-radius: 3px;
}

.nx-actionselect-dropdown>.nx-actionselect-dropdown-item:last-child {
  border-bottom-right-radius: 3px;
  border-bottom-left-radius: 3px;
  border-bottom: none;
}


/* Tables */

table.nx-skootable-data {
    border-collapse:separate;
}

table.nx-skootable-data th {
    background: #939598;
    height:45px;
    font-family: FuturaPTB, sans-serif;
    font-weight: lighter;
    font-size: 13pt;
    color: #FFFFFF;
    border-right: 1px solid white;
    text-align:left;
    padding-left:10px;
    padding-right:10px;
}

table.nx-skootable-data tbody td, table.nx-skootable-data thead td {
    border-bottom: 1px solid white;
    height: 45px;
    border-right: 1px solid white;
    background: #F0F0F0;
    vertical-align: middle;
    font-family: ArialPARC, sans-serif;

@font-face {
    font-family: FuturaPTB;
    src: url(/resource/PARC_fonts/FuturaStd-Book.otf);
}

@font-face {
    font-family: ArialPARC;
    src: url(/resource/PARC_fonts/Arial.ttf);
}

/* General Styling */

.nx-page .ui-widget, body .nx-page, .nx-page td {
  font-family: ArialPARC, sans-serif;
}

/* Page Titles */

.nx-pagetitle-maintitle .ui-widget {
    font-family: FuturaPTB, sans-serif;
    font-weight: normal;
    font-size: 16pt;
    color: #6d6f71;
}

/* Buttons */

.nx-actionbutton {
    float: left;
    background: #254EA2;
    margin: 0 6px 5px 0;
    border-radius:3px;
    -webkit-border-radius: 3px;
    -moz-border-radius: 3px;
}

.ui-button, .ui-widget-content .ui-button.ui-state-default{
    background: #254EA2;
    margin: 0 6px 5px 0;
    border-radius:3px;
    color: white;
    font-size: 12pt !important;
    height: 50px;
    padding: 0px 10px;
}
.ui-button .ui-button-text{
    line-height: 41px;
}
.ui-button-text-icon-primary .ui-button-text{
    padding-left: 23px;
}

.ui-button-text-icon-primary .ui-icon{
    margin-top: -8px;
}

.ui-button.ui-state-hover, .ui-widget-content .ui-button.ui-state-default:hover{
    color: black;
    background: #FFD400;
}

.ui-button.nx-button-secondary{
    color: #254EA2;
    box-shadow: 0 0 0 1px #254EA2 inset;
    border-color: #254EA2;
}

.ui-button.nx-button-secondary.ui-state-hover{
    box-shadow: 0 0 0 1px #254EA2 inset;
    border-color: #254EA2;
    color: #254EA2;
    background: #eee;
}

.nx-actionselect {
    background: #254EA2;
    cursor: pointer;
    white-space: nowrap;
    position: relative;
    color: #FFF;
    border-radius: 3px;
    font-weight: 400;
    font-size: 12pt;
    font-family: ArialPARC, sans-serif;
    margin: 0 4px 7px 0;
    border:none;
    box-shadow:none;
    line-height: 41px;
    height: 50px;
    padding: 0px 10px;
    border-bottom: none;
}

.nx-actionselect.nx-conditiontoken:hover{
    background: #FFD400;
    color: black;
}

.nx-actionselect:hover, .nx-actionbutton:hover {
    color: #000;
    background: #FFD400;
}

.nx-actionselect.unavailable:hover, .nx-actionbutton.unavailable:hover {
    color: white;
    background: #ddd;
    cursor: default;
}

/* Dropdown */
.nx-actionselect-dropdown{
  background: none;
  border-radius: 3px;
}
.nx-actionselect-dropdown>.nx-actionselect-dropdown-item {
  background: #254EA2;
  border-bottom: 1px solid #446AB8;
  color: white;
}

.nx-actionselect-dropdown>.nx-actionselect-dropdown-item:hover {
  background: #FFD400;
  color: black;
  opacity: 1;
}

.nx-actionselect-dropdown>.nx-actionselect-dropdown-item:first-child {
  border-top-right-radius: 3px;
  border-top-left-radius: 3px;
}

.nx-actionselect-dropdown>.nx-actionselect-dropdown-item:last-child {
  border-bottom-right-radius: 3px;
  border-bottom-left-radius: 3px;
  border-bottom: none;
}


/* Tables */

table.nx-skootable-data {
    border-collapse:separate;
}

table.nx-skootable-data th {
    background: #939598;
    height:45px;
    font-family: FuturaPTB, sans-serif;
    font-weight: lighter;
    font-size: 13pt;
    color: #FFFFFF;
    border-right: 1px solid white;
    text-align:left;
    padding-left:10px;
    padding-right:10px;
}

table.nx-skootable-data tbody td, table.nx-skootable-data thead td {
    border-bottom: 1px solid white;
    height: 45px;
    border-right: 1px solid white;
    background: #F0F0F0;
    vertical-align: middle;
    font-family: ArialPARC, sans-serif;
    font-size: 13pt;
}

table.nx-skootable-data a {
    font-size: 13pt;
    color:#254EA2;
}

table.nx-skootable-data tbody tr td:nth-child(odd) {
    background-color:#F9F9F9
}

table.nx-skootable-data tbody tr:nth-child(odd) td:nth-child(even) {
  background-color: #F0F0F0;
}

table.nx-skootable-data .nx-skootable-order-icon{
    margin-top: 3px;
    background: url(data:image/png;base64,);
    width: 13px;
}
table .nx-skootable-order-number{
    display: none !important;
}

.nx-list-footer select {
    width:auto;
    font-family: ArialPARC, sans-serif;
}

.nx-list-footer {
    background:transparent;
}

.nx-list-footer .ui-button.ui-state-hover {
    background:#254EA2;
    color:white;
}
/* Table Search */

.nx-editor-header input.searchbox {
  width: 180px;
  font-size: 12pt;
  border: 1px solid #aaa;
  margin: 0 0 7px;
  font-family: ArialPARC, sans-serif;
  line-height: 41px;
  height: 50px;
  background: #f5f5f5;
}

.nx-editor-header input.searchbox:disabled {
    background: #ddd;
    opacity: .6;
}

.nx-editor-header input.searchbox::-webkit-input-placeholder {
   font-size: 12pt;
}

.nx-editor-header input.searchbox:-moz-placeholder { /* Firefox 18- */
   font-size: 12pt; 
}

.nx-editor-header input.searchbox::-moz-placeholder {  /* Firefox 19+ */
   font-size: 12pt;
}

.nx-editor-header input.searchbox:-ms-input-placeholder {  
   font-size: 12pt;
}

/* Field Editors */

.nx-basicfieldeditor-section-header {
  padding: 8px;
  border-bottom: none;
  font-family: FuturaPTB, sans-serif;
  font-size: 16pt;
  font-weight: 400;
  color: #939598;
}

/* Tabs */
.ui-tabs{
    background: none;
}
.ui-tabs-nav{
    font-family: FuturaPTB, sans-serif;
}
.nx-lefttabs>.ui-tabs-nav, .nx-righttabs>.ui-tabs-nav{
    box-shadow: 0px 0px 3px 0px #aaa;
}
.nx-lefttabs>.ui-tabs-nav li a  .nx-template{
    margin: 0px;
    font-size: 10pt;
    line-height: normal;
}
.nx-lefttabs .nx-tab-icon{
    color: #6d6f71;
}
.ui-tabs .ui-tabs-nav .ui-tabs-anchor{
    width: 100%;
    padding: 7px 12px;
    white-space: normal;
}
.ui-tabs .ui-tabs-nav li.ui-tabs-active, .ui-tabs .ui-tabs-nav li.ui-tabs-active.ui-state-hover{
    background: #f1f1f1;
    margin-bottom: 0px;
    padding-bottom: 0px;
}
.ui-tabs .ui-tabs-nav li.ui-tabs-active a, .ui-tabs .ui-tabs-nav li.ui-tabs-active.ui-state-hover a{
    color: black;
}
.ui-tabs .ui-tabs-nav li{
    background: white;
    border-right:none;
}
.ui-tabs .ui-tabs-nav li.ui-state-hover{
    background: #eee;
}
/* Forms */
.nx-basicfieldeditor-item-label.nx-layout-above{
    font-size: 13pt;
    color: #939598;
    line-height: 22pt;
    font-weight: 400;
}
.nx-basicfieldeditor-columngroup {
    background: none;
}
.nx-basicfieldeditor{
    background: none;
    padding: 10px;
}
.nx-basicfieldeditor-section{
    background: none;
    margin: 10px;
}
.nx-basicfieldeditor-item{
    border-bottom: none;
}
.nx-basicfieldeditor .nx-field input:not([type]){
    height: 25px;
    font-family: ArialPARC, sans-serif;
}
.nx-editor .nx-basicfieldeditor-item select{
    max-width: none;
    height: 26px;
    font-family: ArialPARC, sans-serif;
}
.nx-field input, .nx-field textarea, .nx-field select{
    background: white;
    border-color: #ddd;
    border-radius: 3px;
}

/* Wizard */
.nx-wizard .nx-editor-header-title{
    font-family: FuturaPTB, sans-serif;
    font-weight: normal;
    font-size: 16pt;
    color: #6d6f71;
}

/* Multiselect */
.ui-multiselect-checkboxes label input{
    display: inline-block;
    position: relative;
    top: 3px;
}

button.ui-multiselect.ui-widget.ui-state-default {
  background: #254EA2;
  color: white;
  border-radius: 3px;
  border: none;
  min-height: 50px;
  font-size: 12pt;
  line-height: 41px;
}

button.ui-multiselect.ui-state-default:hover {
  background: #FFD400;
  color: black;
}

.ui-multiselect-header.ui-widget-header{
    background: #254EA2;
    font-size: 13pt;
    font-family: ArialPARC, sans-serif;
    border: none;
    padding: 8px 3px;
}
.ui-multiselect-header ul li:nth-child(1) {
  margin-left: 9px;
}
.ui-multiselect-header ul li:nth-child(2) {
  margin-left: 10px;
}
.ui-multiselect-menu.ui-widget-content{
    padding: 3px;
}
.ui-multiselect-header .ui-icon-circle-close{
}
.ui-multiselect-header .ui-icon{
    position: relative;
    top: 1px;
}
.ui-multiselect-header .ui-icon-closethick, .ui-multiselect-header .ui-icon-check{
    margin-right: 2px;
}
.ui-multiselect-menu.ui-widget-content {
  box-shadow: 0px 0px 5px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.3);
}
.ui-multiselect-checkboxes{
    overflow-y: auto;
    font-size: 12pt;
    font-family: ArialPARC, sans-serif;
}

/* Callout Box */
.nx-page .callout-box{
    background: #254EA2;
    padding: 30px;
    color: white;
    font-family: ArialPARC, sans-serif;
    font-size: 13pt;
    margin-bottom: 35px;
}
.nx-page .callout-box h2{
    font-weight: 400;
    color: white;
    font-size: 16pt;
}
.nx-page .callout-box .btn{
    background: #FFD400;
    color: black;
}
.nx-page .callout-box ul{
    margin-bottom: 20px;
}
.nx-template{
    font-family: ArialPARC, sans-serif;
    font-size: 13pt;
    margin: 10px;
}

/* General html */
.nx-page h1, .nx-page h2{
    font-weight: 400;
    font-family: FuturaPTB, sans-serif;
    color: #939598;
}

.nx-template .btn{
    background: #254EA2;
    border-radius:3px;
    color: white;
    font-size: 13pt;
    height: 50px;
    line-height: 21px;
    padding: 15px 30px;
    font-weight: normal;
}
.nx-template{
    color: #6d6f71;
    font-size: 13pt;
    line-height: 18pt;
}
.nx-template li{
    font-size: 13pt;
}
.nx-template a{
    font-size: 13pt;
    color: #4E7DBF;
}

.nx-template a:hover{
    text-decoration: underline;
}

/* vidyard override */
.vidyard_tmask{
    position: fixed !important;
}

.vidyard_play_button a:hover {
  background-position: 0px 0px;
}
.vidyard_play_button a {
  position: absolute;
  margin: -42px 0 0 -26px;
  border-radius: 0px;
  background-position: 0px 0px;
  height: 85px;
  width: 72px;
  background-image: url(data:image/png;base64,);
